Sentence.sentence: The central figures in the Chicago schools strike are neither strikers nor managers but 350,000 children.
If a team manager exemplifies such qualities, then the team as a whole would be better able to realize their potential and achieve their objectives.
For this to happen, he suggests the multi-cultural managers exhibit understanding of their own and others’cultural influences and limitations.
the wireless carrier offering the iPhone in the United States, had a more reliable network, said Andrew Yu, mobile devices platform project manager at M.I.T.
Even Intel experimented in 2007 with conferring four uninterrupted hours of quiet time (no phone or e-mail) every Tuesday morning on 300 engineers and managers.
A prime example Schweitzer and his colleagues cite is the 2004 collapse of energy-trading giant Enron, where managers used financial incentives to motivate salesmen to meet specific revenue goals.
Leadership is the most significant word in today's competitive business environment because it directs the manager of a business to focus inward on their personal capabilities and style.

Business leadership means that managers need to "put first things first," which implies that before leading others, you need to be clear on your own values, abilities, and strengths and be seen as trustworthy.
To be good leaders, managers must pay close attention to their own values, abilities and strengths
So what can be done to create more effective managers of the commercial world?

In a division of electronic engineers, who were designing equipments so advanced that they work in teams of up to 150, co-workers and managers were asked to nominate the standouts- the stars in productivity and effectiveness
Well, I'd like the position of sales manager if that position is still vacant.
Chris knows that a new job for a purchasing and maintenance manager for the whole company will be open in a few months, and he would like to be promoted to the job
The man is the manager of the apartment building.

The fact that there is an iced coffee on the market with over a quarter of a woman's daily calories allowance is alarming," Dr Rachel Thompson, science programme manager at London-based WCRF, said in a widely-reported statement

"The project has two sides," says Xavier Serrat, Neurice project manager and researcher at the University of Barcelona,"the short-term fight against the snail, and a mid- to long-term fight against climate change.

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 管理；管理人员；管理部门

entry.def: A manager is a person who is responsible for running part of or the whole of a business organization.

example.ex: The chef, staff and managers are all Chinese.
example.tran: 厨师、工作人员和经理都是中国人。

example.ex: ...Linda Emery, marketing manager for Wall's sausages.
example.tran: 琳达·埃默里——沃尔香肠公司的营销经理

entry.def: The manager of a pop star or other entertainer is the person who looks after their business interests.
entry.tran: (明星、艺人等的)经纪人，业务管理人

entry.def: The manager of a sports team is the person responsible for training the players and organizing the way they play. In American English, manager is only used for baseball; in other sports, coach is used instead.
entry.tran: (球队的)主教练(在美国英语中，该词只用于棒球球队，其他运动则用 coach 一词指主教练)

means.word_mean: 1. someone who controls resources and expenditures
2. (sports) someone in charge of training an athlete or a team

sentences.cn: 最后, 即便是那些战胜市场的资金管理人也会让客户资金收益的表现落后于大盘.
sentences.en: Finally, even money managers who can beat the market may leave clients lagging behind the market.

sentences.cn: 作为一名管理人员, 迈克的确是颇有本事.
sentences.en: As a manager, Mike really has something on the ball.

sentences.cn: 系统还提供了模拟数据功能, 为林业管理人员决策提供支持.
sentences.en: Furthermore, the system provided the function of data simulation, which could help forestry managers make decision.

sentences.cn: “ 射得不坏, ”工程管理人罗曼-海恩斯说.
sentences.en: " Not bad shooting,'said project manager Norman Haynes.

sentences.cn: 所有管理人员的公司, 不管是哪一级领导, 有相同类型的信息需求.
sentences.en: All managers of a company, no matter what level, have the same type of information needs.

sentences.cn: 船舶管理人面对海事索赔时,可与船舶所有人立于同样的地位,享受海事索赔责任限制.
sentences.en: The ship manager may limit his liability of maritime claim as the ship owner.

sentences.cn: 河北附近一家未经审批的食品厂的管理人员被逮捕了.
sentences.en: Managers at one unapproved foodstuffs factory near Hebei were arrested.

sentences.cn: 没有一个好的系统,管理人员只能去管理“个性”了,那是管理人员的雷区.
sentences.en: Without good systems managers are left to manage personalities which is a management minefield.

sentences.cn: 人们可以通过登陆该系统,根据管理人员设定的权限对系统进行使用.
sentences.en: People can use the system with loginning theand the popedom the manager granted.

sentences.cn: 管理人员所做的事情,都要能够围绕第二个习惯.
sentences.en: And managers should implement activities which aim to achieve the second habit.

sentences.cn: 管理人自然对短期內有回报的项目抱有偏爱.
sentences.en: Managers are naturally biased towards projects showing a quick return.

sentences.cn: 猎头公司说,这是非常不寻常的人民都是伟大贸易商和伟大的管理人员.
sentences.en: Headhunters say it is very unusual for people to be both great traders and great managers.

sentences.cn: 公司拥有一批专业制造及维修技术人员 、 高素质管理人才和产品花样电脑制作设计人才.
sentences.en: We have of professional manufacture and repair technicians, high quality managers and product pattern designers.

sentences.cn: 他接撑公司的第一件事就是把所有不称职的管理人员一律解雇.
sentences.en: He dismissed all the incompetent managers the first thing after he took over the company.

sentences.cn: 当你启动下一个重大战略举措之前, 花点时间问一声: 管理人员该 怎么办 ?
sentences.en: Before launching your next big strategic move, spare a moment to ask: what about the managers?

sentences.cn: 站在生产线旁劳动的工人们对于管理人员总是抱有反感.
sentences.en: The worker on the assembly line is resentful of the managers.

sentences.cn: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。
sentences.en: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.

sentences.cn: 其他行业只得精简管理人员以减少行政开支。
sentences.en: Other industries have had to sack managers to reduce administrative costs.

sentences.cn: 基金管理人不适合监管公司。
sentences.en: Fund managers are poorly placed to monitor firms.

sentences.cn: 和其他多数拥有严格等级制度的美国公司一样，这里的工人和管理人员都有界定严格的职责。
sentences.en: Like most other American companies with a rigid hierarchy, workers and managers had strictly defined duties.

sentences.cn: 他们教给管理人员要将挫折视为生意上的平常事。
sentences.en: They teach managers to accept reversals as a fact of business life.

sentences.cn: 下面,有请张理事长为今天的大会献辞.
sentences.en: Now let's have our manager Mr. Zhang give a speech for today's meeting.

sentences.cn: LadyBritomart建议Stephen接受他的继承权,然后雇个经理来管理事业.
sentences.en: Lady Britomart advises Stephen to accept his inheritance and then hire a manager to run it.

sentences.cn: 每名企业里的经理事实上就是业务分析员.
sentences.en: Every manager in a business is a de facto business analyst.

In the workplace, feedback may not be so welcome to managers with a fixed mind-set.

Ask to see the manager politely but firmly.

Sentence.sentence: In a multi-stage life, you could be an undergraduate at 20, 40, or 60; a manager at 30, 50, or 70; and become an independent producer at any age.
